column1: Unsafe shell command constructed from library input
column2: Using externally controlled strings in a command line may allow a malicious user to change the meaning of the command.
column4: [["String concatenation"|"relative:///index.js:818:15:818:44"]] based on library input is later used in [["shell command"|"relative:///index.js:818:7:818:59"]].

column2: Writing network data directly to the file system allows arbitrary file upload and might indicate a backdoor.
